> [[ Underground: Averron Observatory – Communication Hub // Neutral Territory // PVP Disabled ]]

“Packing up?” She’s flipping switches as you come into the room, to dull the lights and shut off some of the incessantly-humming machines.

“About ready to,” She responds. “Wanted to make sure I got everything Hecatelia had to send us. Going to give it a more detailed look as soon as possible.”

“Anything good?” You ask.

“Uh, yeah.” Ayla gives a bit of a nervous laugh. “Turns out they’re a good bit ahead of us, if that’s still a surprise to you. We’ve got some underground layouts and info on their Excavator design, as well as possibly some experimental weapons tech that looks interesting. They just finished putting their whole bestiary through, which we can’t compare to what we’ve got just yet thanks to the blackout.”

“Think they’re just doing us a favor?” You ask.

“Someone who had a problem with us wouldn’t give us information this useful.” She folds her arms. “Unless they had something to gain from us, or it was just a pittance to them despite being a game-changer for us.”

You’re not sure how you feel about that.

> Write-in.
> Thank her and go.
